Item ID1141

A steel med helm is the third-weakest medium helmet. A player with 33 Smithing can make this helmet by using one steel bar on an anvil while carrying a hammer, granting 37.5 Smithing experience.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-3+0
 Defence bonuses
+7+8+6-1+7
